text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki mera paravaradigaar apane bandon mein se jisake lie chaahata hai rozee kushaada kar deta hai aur (jisake lie chaahata hai) tang kar deta hai aur jo kuchh bhee tum log (usakee raah mein) kharch karate ho vah usaka aivaj dega aur vah to sabase behatar rozee denevaala hai
